text:
Are you ready to have a lot
of fun with Friends today?

In this scenes that we've selected
for you today Phoebe is actually dating a guy called Scott,

and need some dating and romantic advice from
Joey! But before we jump into the scene

don't forget that we are here to help
you learn English with your favorite

TV Series and movies without getting
lost, without missing the jokes and without subtitles.

Just like this fan who says that our channel has
helped them greatly improve their speaking

and perform well on the IELTS exam.
So, if that's something you would like to do

make sure you hit that subscribe
button and the bell down below

this way you will not miss a single
one of our new lessons!

Now, if there is something you shouldnâ€™t
take too slow is your English learning.

And if you are a big fan of Friends
like me and want to learn English in a fun way,

then I highly recommend our FwF course! Not
only will you learn thousands of the words
that we use in our every speech, you will learn real native pronunciation, all the expressions that we use,

and of course laugh along with all the jokes!
The best part is you can try it for free

right now with our 3-Part Masterclass.
You can click up here,

or down in the description box below
to learn more and sign up now!

I don't know about you, but everytime
I watch Friends it brightens my mood!

So, if you want to keep on having fun,
learning English and specifically

dating and relationship vocabulary
I highly recommend this lesson we made.

Watch it next by clicking up here or
down in the description box below!
